title: Masters of Animation 1
creator_credit: John Halas and Education Film Centre
brief_description: A survey, recent and past, from Great Britain, Yugoslavia, Japan and Italy. Originally thirteen episodes, now on three videotapes, the animation covered by the series represents the peak achievements of over 7,000 artists from more than 13 countries. The films selected were awarded 8 Oscars, 21 Oscar nominations and 120 International Prizes between them. Rated: G
